about_the_game:
Suess Academy of Witchcraft and Wizardry Recruitment Notice:
Dear student, your magic letter has arrived, in view of your excellent performance and talented, in a crowd of muggles stand out, we have reviewed, decided to send this letter sincere invitation. suess witch academy has the most harmonious teaching environment, do not worry about dealing with interpersonal relationships, the sisters are the best to get along, they will take good care of you ~ ❤
You closed the letter and fell into a deep thought, you understand all the reasoning, but why the magical girl academy ah!!!

Game Features


In the game, you will experience:
- Continuation of the world view of the previous game, more immersive plot and fascinating erotic content descriptions
- The character persona is more in-depth, what are the secrets of the two schoolmates?
- Interesting and creative gameplay experience, a new way to play!
- A total of 10 CGs are available, with up to dozens of additional illustrated events
- New dynamic cg

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all age groups, or it may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace: nude or sexual content, involuntary sexual copy descriptions, non sexual copy descriptions with the protagonist, and other mature content.

All characters involved in sexual content are over 18 years old.

name: Adorable Witch5 : Lingering - adult patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Adorable Witch5 : Lingering is a role-playing game with light-hearted and casual level solving in which the player takes on the role of the main character who is trying to learn and help his classmates in the magic world to reach the final ending.
